Knot Theory Links

A collection of interesting knot theory things from across the web.

Useful Pages with Information

  • KnotInfo: A web site which catalogs known values of important knot invariants.
  • Knot Atlas: A site with more details on some prime knots.
  • Knot Plot: The main site for a software package for drawing knots.
  • The Rolfsen Table: hosted at the Knot Atlas, this is Dale Rolfsen’s table of prime knots with small crossing numbers.

Some Books as PDFs

(try to stay out of these for now)

  • Murasugi’s Knot Theory and Its Applications
  • Crow and Fox’s Introduction to Knot Theory
